title: The Unknown Soldier
description: When Shawna Nicholson, Chief Resident of an Iowa hospital, treats an emergency patient who came from the future with multiple wounds and amnesia, neither Shawna nor the mystery man is prepared for the deadly pursuers determined to destory Shawna's patient and anyone who tries to stop them. Author Reichert draws upon her experience as a doctor to add a realistic edge to this sci-fi thriller.
author: Mickey Zucker Reichert
